snippet: Two counties, separated by fortune and 350 miles, demonstrate the widening divide in life expectancy between affluent and struggling areas of the United States.
abstract: Wealthy Fairfax County, Va, and blue-collar McDowell County, W Va, illustrate the growing divide in life expectancy between affluent and struggling areas of the United States; gap has widened over past decade, with men living an average of 82 years in Fairfax and only 64 years in McDowell.
lead_paragraph: Two counties, separated by fortune and 350 miles, demonstrate the widening divide in life expectancy between affluent and struggling areas of the United States.

headline.main: Income Gap, Meet the Longevity Gap
headline.print_headline: Income Gap, Meet the Longevity Gap
